TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WebEventProvider extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase
Public MustInherit Class WebEventProvider Inherits ProviderBase

summary.span: 提供無緩衝事件提供者的基底類別。

span.span: Provides the base class for non buffered event providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件類型。The namespace contains the health event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 如果您想要自訂的健全狀況事件的處理，您可以從其中類別來建立您自己的自訂提供者。If you want to customize the health-event processing, you can derive from the class to create your own custom provider. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將能夠實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，而您會藉由指定的值控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視類型的類型來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 如需範例衍生自類別，請參閱本主題中所提供的範例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生自類別來建立自訂提供者會將已設定的事件寫入至本機檔案，其必須被授與適當的存取權。The following code example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom provider that writes the configured events to a local file for which appropriate access rights must be granted. 此自訂提供者範例很簡單，而且其主要目的是要讓您為開發人員完全控制其基本的機制。This custom provider example is simple and its main intent is to give you as developer full control of its basic mechanisms. 在真實世界案例中，您可以使用此提供者，特別是經過緩衝處理的範例提供者可在，做為初步探查行為的應用程式。In a real-world scenario, you could use this provider and especially the example buffered provider available at , as a preliminary probe into the behavior of an application. 這可協助您在設計階段，來了解可用的資訊。然後稍後您可以將這項資訊來更複雜的提供者。This can help you during the design stage to gain an understanding of the information available; then later you can direct this information to a more complex provider. 下列組態檔摘錄顯示`healthMonitoring`區段設定可讓 ASP.NET 使用上面定義來處理所有健全狀況監視的事件的自訂提供者。The following configuration file excerpt shows a `healthMonitoring` section configuration that enables ASP.NET to use the custom provider defined above to process all health-monitoring events. ``` ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/CS/webeventprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/VB/webeventprovider.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 呼叫。It is called by ASP.NET. 您可以呼叫建構函式會衍生自類別。You can call the constructor when deriving from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在自訂事件提供者中使用這個建構函式。The following code example shows how to use this constructor in a custom event provider. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/CS/webeventprovider.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/VB/webeventprovider.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Flush() cil managed

summary.span: 將事件從提供者的緩衝區移至事件記錄檔。

span.span: Moves the events from the provider's buffer into the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法時，從最後一次寫入或緩衝區中有多少事件以來已經過所有緩衝區中的事件都會立即從緩衝區移至事件記錄檔，而不論多少時間。When this method is called, all the events in the buffer are immediately moved from the buffer to the event log, regardless of how much time has elapsed since last write or how many events are in the buffer. 清除動作的時間會重設上次寫入時間。The time of the last write is reset to the time of the flushing action. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/CS/webeventprovider.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/VB/webeventprovider.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ProcessEvent(class System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent raisedEvent) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub ProcessEvent (raisedEvent As WebBaseEvent)

summary.span: 處理傳遞給提供者的事件。

span.span: Processes the event passed to the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是 ASP.NET 健康監視呼叫開始處理事件的方法。This is the method that ASP.NET health monitoring calls to start processing the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何實作 方法。The following code example shows how to implement the method. 這個方法會將事件的自訂的字串表示附加至特定的記錄檔。This method appends the customized string representation of the event to a specific log file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/CS/webeventprovider.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/VB/webeventprovider.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Shutdown() cil managed

summary.span: 執行與關閉提供者關聯的工作。

span.span: Performs tasks associated with shutting down the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 呼叫裝載 Web 應用程式的應用程式定義域終止時的方法。ASP.NET calls the method when the application domain hosting the Web application terminates. 方法會呼叫以執行工作，可讓應用程式結束依正常程序，例如關閉的資源。The method is called to perform tasks that will allow the application to end gracefully, such as closing resources. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/CS/webeventprovider.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider/VB/webeventprovider.vb#4)]
